test_summary: Comprehensive test of CARL fixes including GUI layout, EZ-Robot status, action system, memory recall, and hover over improvements

fixes_tested.name: GUI Layout Fix
fixes_tested.description: Move Legacy Test Buttons next to Emotion Display but before Output groupbox

fixes_tested.name: EZ-Robot Status Fix
fixes_tested.description: Improve error handling for EZ-Robot connection issues during startup body_function_test

fixes_tested.name: Action System Fix
fixes_tested.description: Clarify logging for non-physical actions like 'greet' that are not directly executable

fixes_tested.name: Memory Recall Fix
fixes_tested.description: Pause cognitive ticking during memory recall operations

fixes_tested.name: Hover Over Improvements
fixes_tested.description: Future improvements for hover over functionality
